<setup: hospital room, tense atmosphere>
<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>
Razumihin: “It’s nothing, just a faint!”  
Mother: “But he looks so pale!”  
Sister: “Is he really okay?”

---
<setup: hospital room, emotional expressions>
<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>
Raskolnikov: *gazes at them silently*  
Raskolnikov: *feels an agonizing weight inside*  
Mother: “Please, say something!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Razumihin reassures Raskolnikov's family after he faints, insisting it is just a minor issue despite their anxiety.
